script.dialog: Please don't give up!
It's going to get so much harder, but I know you can do this!
Please,     just don't give up.
I won't!
It's still dark outside.
It's raining again.
Little Robot was wrong.
This Unit has located the young Zaraden.|L|She was not at the usual location.
This Unit was about to activate panic mode.
It's still raining today.
You said it would stop.
|C3|Update:|C0| This Unit had calculated the correct probability of rain. However, she also discovered an anomaly.
Approximately 4 hours into the day cycle, This Unit calculated a sudden jump from 0.01% to 100% probability of rain.
Current atmospheric readings indicate a 0.01% chance of rain tomorrow.
|C3|Hypothesis:|C0| The rain is being manipulated by an unknown force.
So the rain was going to stop,   but then something made it keep going?
And this is happening every single day?
That is the working hypothesis of This Unit.
Then it's hopeless?|L||!|The rain will never end?
Why even go out there again?|L|They're just going to forget about me tomorrow.
This rain may be related to the memory loss of the monsters.
It doesn't matter.|L||!|We can't do anything about it.
This Unit has met this young Zaraden on over 140 different days. She has given up exactly 0 times in all of those days.
But I couldn't remember-
The young Zaraden has overcome the memory loss. It is possible that the monsters can overcome as well.
It is possible that the young Zaraden can still help the monsters.
This young Zaraden now has the advantage of retaining knowledge from previous attempts.
This Unit believes that we can find the source of this rain.
We can do this.
I wonder how I was suddenly able to keep my memory.
This Unit has no data on this phenomenon.
However, This Unit did note that the heart of the young Zaraden was radiating more light than on any previous day.
That glow has persisted through every following day.
It does feel warmer.|L|Even more than before the rain.
Little Robot-
You taught me how to use my love powers every single day even though you knew I would forget?
That is correct.
You are the best!
I can't give up on the monsters either!
|wave|I love you!
This Unit is relieved that the Zaraden is feeling better.
